channel.title: ColorPipe-tools
channel.description: ColorPipe-tools is a set of tools to handle and process LUTs or color spaces. It includes PlotThatLUT, a tool to plot LUT and LUTLab, a bunch of scripts to handle LUT and colorspace.

item.title: New release v0.11
item.description:
LUTLab
* lut_to_lut and curve_to_lut can now use presets file to define export LUT settings.
See some samples here.

  • ext_to_1d_lut has been merge into lut_to_lut. Say hello to –smooth-size option !

  • curve_to_lut has now on option to auto-detect input range : –process-input-range

There’s many changes on these tools, see LUT to LUT, Curve to LUT and presets pages.

Utils
* New helper : 3dl
* Improved helper : spi, cube, csp, ascii

Dev
* Lots of refactoring
* New tests (and a jenkins build).

Doc
* Update of the github.io site
